website_summaries.verdict: A perfect solution for indoor cats that long to be outside and suitable for smaller dogs when supervised.
pros: Ultra lightweight and easy to put up and take down
Can accommodate small dogs and cats, even guinea pigs and rabbits
cons: Its all mesh sides and base tend to snag cat claws

customer_reviews.title: This is what you are looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 kitties. Easy to set up and connect to the run. Good and bad is that it is completely enclosed. Good because the kitties can't get out. Bad because towards the end of the season my two kitties found it an ideal out door toilet. :( So it was something that I had to take apart every day and "clean" by tipping it up and shaking it out. There was no "access" panel to get at things without taking it apart. Which reminds me. I had read complaints about the zipper but for me it worked each time. Still this gave the kitties so much joy and I plan on using this again next year!!
customer_reviews.author: John Reid

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this product last July, I only started using it recently because one of our kittens got sick. (He's much better now.) It was going pretty well, but then today I went to set it up and one of the four rods that connects at the top had some how popped out rendering the entire thing useless. This was only the third time we've used it. Looking at this, neither my husband nor I can figure out how this happened as there is clearly no way to get it back into that enclosed space at the top where the other rods go.
customer_reviews.author: suepow

customer_reviews.title: I was very excited to get this tent for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this tent for my two cats. Unfortunately, after one use there is already a hole near the opening big enough for them to start to work their way out. Also, the top collapsed and the tent fell on them causing them to get very nervous. This was not a cheap tent, especially to only have been able to use it once. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up and take down. My cats were uncertain about it at first, but now they love it. This is the perfect way to relax outside with your cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My cat escaped
customer_reviews.text: The tent is spacious, light weight, easy to assemble, however the door zipper is not strong enough. My car got spooked by a loud noise and burst right through the zipper to escape. You must not leave your pet unattended, and I'd advise to reinforce the entry point somehow as it was way too easy for her to get out
customer_reviews.author: haircut

customer_reviews.title: Use in Motorhome!
customer_reviews.text: We have a motor home and it is always an issue when traveling as our two cats would find places to hide (not all of them safe, ie: inside the slide-out) while we are moving. This tent, when open, fits perfectly on our queen-size bed. We use an old quilt on the floor, add litter box , food and water and- presto- a traveling suite! Cats love it and so do we 😀! Using it outside for fresh air is secondary, but nice as well. So pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Rodgers Long

customer_reviews.title: ... break I will never buy from this company again wasted fifty
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these tents The quality gas gone down The rods split and break I will never buy from this company again wasted fifty dollars
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Pogue-Juergensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but needs an additional opening for add ons.
customer_reviews.text: The tent is a simple design and easy to use. It pops up and folds up quickly when you might only want to spend a little time outside or take it to the park. I really wish it had two openings so you could put the available additional tunnel and another tent (kinda like a hamster habitrail) and still be able to put the cat in easily. For that reason I won’t buy the add ons and gave it four, instead of five, stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo O.

customer_reviews.title: No shelter from direct sunlight - could be dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept of this for my strictly indoor Persians, but within 10 minutes of placing one of two kitties inside the tent, he was severely overheating! (& yes, I had left a bowl of fresh water inside the tent before I went in for the second kitty). Maybe consider making one side of the 4 walls a solid panel that provides shade from direct sunlight? This happened in California in April (so not super hot middle of summer conditions) I was in the house preparing to bring my second Persian out, to put her inside the tent along with some toys and saw him panting and brought him back inside.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best find ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescued litter of 5 kittens. This has been a wonderful find. I can keep them contained and yet maintain a watchful eye on them. So much better than keeping them in a bathroom or bedroom. They have plenty of room to romp and play plus room for their litter box and food/water bowls. The big plus, is I get to be entertained all day!!! Of course, they come out to play but then can get tucked back in where I know they are safe. It also is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you care about your pet
customer_reviews.text: It was fine until the 5th time of use (I had used it for approx 1h each time), after that there was a large hole in the net wall (clearly the manufacturer does not take into consideration cats have nails). In addition the tent kept collapsing over my cat regardless if I insured the mechanism was in place according to directions each time I set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina M Orne

customer_reviews.title: I think it's ridiculous but the cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this. I think it's ridiculous but the cats love it. Honestly, the thought of buying a tens of dollars anything for the cats, that isn't a cat tower or medical attention, is hard for me. That said, this lets them out and enjoy time with us outside. Harnesses are fine but it restricts their movement and it clearly makes them uneasy. At least, with this tent, they are able to roam and are not encumbered by a restrictive harness. As an aside, it takes my cats a couple of minutes to adjust to being inside of the tent. They test the boundaries and paw at the enclosure until they mellow out. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Wm.

customer_reviews.title: Cats are indifferent-what else is new :)
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love it. The cats may be indifferent, but at least they can hang outside with us and get some fresh air and sunshine! They meow constantly to go outside, but they want to be roaming free, but they can slip through slats in our fence and we are on a busy street. So I can't monitor or chase them around, and they are both escape artists, so the tent it is! They meow and try to get out, but after a while they just lay down and take a nap. It will take some time for them to get used to it, but I am definitely a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P. Lesmes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Use *Little* steps when introducing it to nervous cats
customer_reviews.text: I made sure I left it up in my house for a few days to get my cat used to it, then I began feeding him in it. When he was comfortable in it, I began carrying him onto the back porch and back in the house (as the 'great outdoors' was kinda scary). I began repeatedly carrying him down the steps and back up into the house. These little steps ensured that when he was relaxed about all the parts of my endeavor, I could string the steps together. Then I would carry him outside, put him in his feeding tent, and know that he was relaxed and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AmyGrace

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor animal ( cat in my case) “safe area,” is just what I wanted. It is light, easy to setup and take down, easy to carry, and does as intended. I opened the pkg in my house, fed my cat a treat on it ( still collapsed) , popped it open, got a cat toy and threw it through the doorway. My cat immediately jumped in and played. Havent had it long, but it looks very well made and surely is sturdy enough-roomy too. Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Chef

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve ever gotten!
customer_reviews.text: This actually may be the best thing I’ve ever bought for my cat! She loves going for walks but mostly she just loves to sit outside and watch so this works perfect for her! It’s way bigger than I thought it would be and the set up and tear down are SUPER easy. I can set it up in less than 30 sec and tear down in less than a minute. Easily portable and small once all put away. Would strongly recommend to anyone with a cat who loves the outdoors but can’t go out on their own!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Wise

customer_reviews.title: 10000 Stars !
customer_reviews.text: It more then met my expectations! My new kitten, Apollo Moon loves being near me and the family- I already had the long mesh tube this company makes - so I'm familiar with the fine quality of their products - I'm really happy with this purchase - Next I'll attach the two and watch the fun he'll have ! Thank you for creating these great play houses for our beloved four legged family members!
customer_reviews.author: DAPHNE

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable cat tent has changed my aging and blind cat's life!!! She can be out and enjoy the scents and sunlight and still be perfectly safe. As soon as she feels the sun through the door, she is pacing and meowing for me to set up her tent. I love how easy it is to operate both setting up and taking down!! I would highly recommend this little tent for any pet that needs a safe enclosure while outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing! It’s super easy to assemble and disassemble. I was switching my cat to indoors only instead of indoor/outdoor for his safety. But I felt kind of bad because he loved laying outside and all the smells. This tent works great for him! He can’t get out as it’s very sturdy but he has a good amount of space to move around and he absolutely loves it! And since the bottom of the tent is mesh like the rest of it he can still feel the grass below him like he’s used to.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha L.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Easy to pop up and down. Very roomy. Could fit a few small dogs or cats in there. Our Siamese does not like to be without us, and we got sick of his screaming when we eat dinner in the back garden. Problem solved! We pop it open and he's happy as can be. My only suggestion would be to make the hole bigger so you could put cat towers or kitty liter box in for camping or longer stays. But, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Knox Watson

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Best Amazon purchase in a long time! I was on the fence about buying this because I wasn't sure how sturdy it would be, but I've used it nearly every day since it arrived two months ago and I am very pleased so far. My cat loves it and it has made quarantine a lot more bearable since it's big enough for both of us to hang out in. Not sure what my neighbors think, but we love it!
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome idea for indoor cats to have the chance to be outside! It just pops up real quick and easy and folds down just as easy to bring in. My kitty wakes me up in the morning so she can going it and watch the birds. I gave it 4 stars because the zipper door is coming unthreaded. So far it is doing fine I'm just careful. I should be able to sew it. I highly recommend this product. Especially if you have a hyper picky kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: My cats seem to really like just sitting in there
customer_reviews.text: I lucked out. My cats seem to really like just sitting in there, listening to all the sounds and watching all the activity on the street. I just got the tent part, with no tunnel. The zipper seems to be decent. Mesh seems sturdy enough so they are not tempted to try and claw through it. I LOVE the single pull deployment system. You just grab the strings at the top and pull about 10 inches and the thing just pops open. I fold it up when they are done. I don't see any point leaving out in the elements when it's so easy to collapse and fold up.
customer_reviews.author: BShooSHoo

customer_reviews.title: Caged cat😾
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a smell hole which I'm sure would of ended up bigger. My cat did not like this at all. He's a indoor car but likes to go outside. He is a exotic cat so I don't like him wandering. He hated being trapped inside this tent. The minute I would let him out he would happily lay next to the tent. Inside of it pacing, howling and crying. It's like cat toys some they love others they will have nothing to do with. If he would of liked it I would of returned and got a new one. Make sure you check the tent over well for small holes.
customer_reviews.author: Gia M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One happy cat lady!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it looks so stylish! My little Maple loves her tent!! Normally she'll claw at the screen door to get out, but when placed in her tent, she just lays there comfortably and looks around. So happy to have her hang out with me while I garden :) The holes in the mesh are large enough to let grass poke through for her to chew on, too! Could not be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha W.

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for Fur Babies and their Person!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Purrfect way to let the fur baby outside but safely. Added some cardboard furniture and I have added more stuff to give him a place to lie down comfortably. It is sturdy yet has some give which makes it easy to maneuver when it is taking up space. Only difficult set up part was collapsing it actually. But you just gotta push down without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We traveled from Texas to Washington over the course of 3 days with a cat and a dog that had not been integrated (introduced but lived apart). This was a perfect solution to keep them safely apart. It fits almost perfectly on top of a queen-sized mattress (for a visual size reference). It is an easy prop up and take down tent. It doesn't take up much space and overall the mesh is thicker than I thought it was going to be. The cat tried to dig in it a few times and it held up (nails not trimmed)!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much the dog goes in!
customer_reviews.text: So great my dog goes in it! Lol I got this because my one Cat tries to go outside all day everyday but he always be lines under the fence, they love it and my silly dog loves it too. It’s so easy to assemble and dissemble, literally instant I take it in and out all the time. Super easy and they are enjoying all the outside time!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for our indoor cat!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments we've ever made for our cat. This is the second tent we've purchased: the first one we passed onto our granddaughter for her cats when we moved out of state, the second one we bought when we moved into an apartment, which has a small patio. It fits perfectly with some room to spare so we are able to leave it set up all the time. It's a dream to set up and take down. Harvey, strictly an indoor cat, loves it because he now gets to join us on the patio and enjoy the fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome play area for cats. This is the best invention since bread. This all mesh tent let’s your kitty be outside with you to get some fresh air without running off. This is large enough to fit a litter box, cat bed, toys, water and food bowl and there is still room for the cat/cats to play. Easy pop up, easy take down ( follow instructions for take down) and you can cover different sides with lightweight blanket to create shade if you need to. As always you should never leave your pets unattended, as this would not keep large predatory animals out.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Unexpected Problem
customer_reviews.text: This tent was very easy to set up...for my teenage neighbors. I had trouble figuring out, but they did it in seconds! Very nice, no assembly to speak of. My one cat, 2 yr. old male Bailey, went in and was very chill, lying in the shade. So I went and got my other 2 yr. old male, Bing, a Siamese mix. He was NOT chill. He was agitated. He paced. Before long, they were fighting. The tent went w/them, from the lawn to the porch. A hole was knocked in the tent. Was able to use it for awhile, but Bailey soon realized that he could use the hole and get out. I've ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 8 week old kittens to enjoy outdoors. It was perfect good quality, easy to put up and take down. They are now 1.5 years old and yard trained (while we follow them around!) or we take them out on a harness but when we are busy and they want to be out, this is still perfect for them. We can fit a large litter box in it as well. Note, photo is from when they were babies.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great cat enclosure
customer_reviews.text: We've been very happy with this Habitat. Our beloved feline has started losing his faculties and this has been a good solution to him wandering off where ever. Seems well built and has held up well. Its also big enough to give him some room to move around, as well as have a bed, food, and a litterbox. . The only minor hitch is that the access hole is a little small for an adult to get through to clean, etc. but that's a minor quibble. Recommend, either indoors or out.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Long

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier with this purchase and the cats love it
customer_reviews.text: We have had this set out all summer, our neighbor asked where she could buy one for her kids. I bought some tent stakes since 2 of the ones it came broke the first day and the tent is very secure, couldn't be happier with this purchase and the cats love it. Update almost a year after purchase: Spent a few hours stitching mesh back together from the dog wanting to cuddle, and I need to pick up a few patches for the fabric that connects to the pole but still working great. Love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Vphoto

customer_reviews.title: Cats and kittens enjoy being outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her indoor cat since he loves to be outside so much. Ended up borrowing it back from her for our kitten. Both cats love it! Plenty of room to romp around and relax while enjoying the fresh air. Although the kitten has climbed up the sides and on the "roof" it has not snagged or torn. The dog has even stepped on it and his claws didn't rip through the material. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Kitty tent! Easy set up easy breakdown. It literally couldn't be easier. And it's escape-proof for my 7 month old kitten. It's big enough to put a litter box food and water and a good size chair cushion inside. What a wonderful way to bring my inside Kitty out but keep him safe. Do not leave unattended though!
customer_reviews.author: pac

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious, easy, and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product. I took it out of the box and set it up in 30 seconds on my small deck (fits nearly perfectly) and situated the tent door in front of my living room screen door. Put a cheap carpet remnant inside to keep idle claws from scratching the tent floor. The cats were curious and meandered in. They are leery but I'm sure they will soon get used to it, especially if I leave some treats inside. Inventive and very much worth the money. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: garth wolfendale

customer_reviews.title: Cat’s think this is a haven!
customer_reviews.text: We like the secure shelter for our 17 year old cat, easier on him than his harness. Our youngster doesn’t like the shelter as well though, he prefers his harness and leash. This shelter is easy to deploy and tuck away. We live in an RV. this shelter doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: TwoGalsGo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Big enough.
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. I was worried it wouldn't be big enough but it comfortably fits a large cat and 4 kittens inside plus litter box and a box for them to hide in. Not sure how long it will last against them climbing up it with their claws. I got inside it with them. You could camp in this if you wanted or put kids in it to keep bugs off when outdoors. Wish the opening was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Safe way for my cat to get outside
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo is perfect. It's super quick and easy to assemble & disassemble (I have to put it away after each use due to the crazy weather here in Texas). It's sturdy, and the stakes give me extra peace of mind. My cat tried to scratch/claw her way out the first time I put her in, but the gazebo held up and had no tearing at all. Now that shes used to it, its the perfect way to get her outside safely. Fair warning though: Take them out once and be prepared for the daily whining to go outside!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this tent and it's reasonably durable
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for 3 summers of daily use The zipper for the entrance eventually wore out. My cat's love being in this tent. I just ordered another one with the tunnel. I use 4 old plastic dumbbells to hold down the tent by the four corners. Else it will blow of my deck in heavy wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph & Lydia

customer_reviews.title: I like to sit out on my deck and read from ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats and I adore this tent! I like to sit out on my deck and read from time to time, and my two cats are always pawing at the door to get out. They love to be outside, and this allows me to bring them out with me without having to watch their every move and worry about them wandering too far. The size is more than sufficient for my two cats, and setup/takedown is far simpler than I had imagined. Great product! Wish I would have found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. I live in a rental unit with a balcony and having an indoor cat, I want to make sure that he is safe at all times. I usually see him wanting to go outside but there's no safe way I can do that for him until I came across this. It's portable and stores easily. It works like an upside down umbrella. I'm so happy that my cat now can enjoy the sun and fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Utterly useless.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this. My 3 month old kitten is able collapse the tent from the inside. She just claws her way up, hangs from the ceiling and it collapses. Utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: emanfl

customer_reviews.title: Kitties Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this for my cats and they very much enjoyed the fresh air and openness of this little enclosure. I love how easy it is to set up and take down...I just wish it had a better put away system maybe like an umbrella strap as its very hard to get back in its bag...almost impossible. Other than that I and my kitties are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shawny O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this tent. We have it on our porch for our cat who has a stress condition called feline idiopathic cystitis that causes her severe pain. Her stress is almost completely gone and she hasn’t had a flare up in over a year! It’s also safe for her to be outside both in the sense that she doesn’t get killed by a car and she doesn’t kill wildlife. It’s a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor kitties that love the sun
customer_reviews.text: My indoor cats used to love lounging by my screened in pool, but when I moved to a garden apartment they were stuck inside. This kitty play pen is perfect. They can sit and watch the birds or spread out in the sun on my patio. It keeps them contained and they feel safe when dog walkers come by the fence. It has deteriorated a little in the direct sun (west-pacing patio in FL), so I have to be careful cleaning the mesh but after several months of use it's still in good shape. I'm buying the tunnel add on.
customer_reviews.author: just4now

customer_reviews.title: Just got my happy habitat and set it up on my porch
customer_reviews.text: Just got my happy habitat and set it up on my porch. Very easy to set up nice design. We did a little try out my Elsa and me and we are very happy. There’s plenty of room inside and I am so glad I can give Elsa outdoor time and I can do my gardening with out having to worry where she is. Meow. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Storhaug

customer_reviews.title: Does not include fun run
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. Keeps them safe while getting some outdoor time. Plenty big enough. Teenagers sat inside just to test it out .Would have given 5 stars but didn't because it didn't come with a fun run, description made it sound like it was included! And will not purchase because it's almost same price as the tent.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Condo!
customer_reviews.text: My indoor cat loves to go outside and sit inside of this kitty condo. It is very roomy. The front zipper door is big so it is easy to put the cat in and out. It is a little hard for one person to set it up. I have to put the upper string between my teeth then use both hands to push the two parts together while pulling the string up with my teeth. My husband would rather laugh at me than help me. It is very easy to take down, however. I really like this and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn Miller-Nucci

customer_reviews.title: Decent tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is decent for the price. I currently use it for 2, 6 week old foster kittens, and it is set up in a bedroom. Very easy to set up. I gave it 4 out of 5 because I wish the door was a little larger. Hard to reach in and grab anything like litter boxes and food bowls. The kittens have started to climb on it and their nails (recently trimmed) have made a couple tiny holes in it already. I found the floor being the same as sides a little weird. And had to put down a thicker blanket to cover it, because their claws kept getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Carafira

customer_reviews.title: Portable, sturdy, easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it! She can sit outside with us and I don't have to worry about her running off. Even took it on vacation. Her litter box and scratching board fits in there with room to spare. I put a piece of cardboard under it because sometimes she doesn't want to sit on the ground. Picture won't load.
customer_reviews.author: Book worm

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and pretty roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I got just the tent without the tunnel. I was afraid the mesh would be too flimsy and break but it's made of life a plastic-y material so it's a bit more sturdy than i expected. the only thing is, my cat claws on the walls when he's in there too long, so that's kind of a problem since the walls aren't like metal, but it is a tent. So easy to assemble takes like a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tom

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat, happy parents
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves this tent and we do too. He’s an indoor cat who wants nothing more than to be an outdoor cat. For obvious reasons we don’t let him out unattended or on a leash but this tent has been a life saver. We still watch over him but with much more ease of mind knowing he cannot get out. So far it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarina

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver for us after our little male kitten broke his foot. We set it up with a bed, mat, food, water, litter box and toys and sometimes attached the ABO tunnel part. We usually had his sister in there with him too for company and put it either in our den or sunroom. Also our puppy could somewhat play with them still. If I could change something it would be to add another little zipper door for easy access so we could reach in to clean the litter box or add toys, and things like that. Overall though, this is a really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Little

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pup enclosure.
customer_reviews.text: It comes assembled and though I'm not an engineer, it appears to me to be well made. It did take a little figuring in how to pop it open but once i figured out how to not just pull the cord but to push down on the plastic ring too, it was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Booker T

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes that it would be convenient to take in and out on a regular basis, to put on my deck for my cats. It is super well-made and super convenient. Folds up easily (ingenious design), lightweight, and sturdy without being unwieldy. My cats love it. It is spacious enough for them to get their roam on without being too large for my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: ... to being inside something then roaming free it is easily to put up and take down it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked for what I wanted it for my cats getting used to being inside something then roaming free it is easily to put up and take down it would be nice if it came with a with a removable sunshade and the door not to come unzipped all the way off and it is so big that it would be nice to have a door in the front and the back so when you need to get a cat or something out of it you do not have to crawl inside it luckily I am on the smaller side but overall good idea. Thanks Kelly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for most uses
customer_reviews.text: Exquisitely made and pleasantly simple to set up. It is sturdily made and quite roomy. But be sure to know that the netting is not very small (1/8" to 1/4" in diameter) and will allow flies and bees into the habitat. I would highly recommend this for older cats that are content to lie in the yard in one place but NOT for a recuperating kitty with wounds or stitches (for what I what I purchased it so sadly, I was not able to use it) that will attract insects. And don't think you're going to contain a playful romping kitten in it!
customer_reviews.author: glttrgal

customer_reviews.title: Not a hit with my cat, but I can't speak to everyone's experience...
customer_reviews.text: My indoor cat Fifi loves being outside. She used to have a patio on my apartment, but she doesn't have that in my current living situation. I thought this might be a nice alternative. Unfortunately, I think it just made her feel nervous, trapped, and open to attack. I'm giving this product 3 stars because I do think it's high quality, and more success might be had by training puppies and kittens instead of using it for dogs and cats with no previous exposure.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great tent to keep kitty confined after surgery
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent to contain my cat indoors after major surgery. It was bigger than expected and fit a small litter box, large dog bed, and feeding dishes with plenty of space between. She tried VERY hard to escape it at first and did manage to make some small holes in the corner but couldn't do any serious damage. I will eventually use it outdoors as intended once she's fully healed. The small opening made things a little difficult, but I think it is probably necessary to prevent kitty prison breaks : )
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We have a partially going cat we take camping with us. She's great on a leash, and really likes this pin. We left if open one night and it collected a few flies. That turned into hours of entertainment for my cat. She did get a hold of the tip and collapse it while inside. It didn't very her and she acted like nothing happened. She can pull the zipper open and escape, so we tie the 2 zippers together.
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad Also Not For My Cat
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a little bit then my cat did not like it anymore and went berzurk. He started to try to rip the thing to shreds. He did not fully succeed but given enough time he would've. All in all not a bad product. It was easy to set up and take down and the storage bag was a nice feature. If you have a well behaved cat or one that is declawed this would be a nice way for that cat to experience the out door without concerns of other this happening to it.
customer_reviews.author: Flizo

customer_reviews.title: Zipper lasted only 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in October of 2016. Were very happy with this outdoor cat enclosure. I am giving 4 stars because after about 2 years of gentle use zipper started having problems, and completely failed this fall (Oct 2020). Also, I always have to ask my husband to collapse it because it is not an easy mechanism for me to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Z_buyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SUGAR GLIDERS EXTRA PLAY AREA INDOORS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tent for our daughter's 2 sugar gliders to have as an extra play area. We just place an old sheet inside the tent for poop collection since they poop as they are playing and climbing around, then just take it all out and shake outside (then wash sheet after use.) The tent folds up and sets up very easily. Our daughter is 5' tall and about 100 lbs and she has no problem setting it up herself. She can also sit or lay inside the tent to play with her sugar gliders and has also had her father who is 5'6 sit comfortably in there with both of them and the sugar gliders.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize the instructions are sewn inside the bag, but I figured out how to set it up anyway. Wish I could say that the cat loved it as much as I do, she’s salty about the floor being mesh. She tolerates me sitting with her in a lawn chair for about 30 mins before we pack it up and go back inside.
customer_reviews.author: inu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to take our cat outside with us without him becoming a meal or running off, and this does the trick. Super simple to erect and take down. I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think he liked the mesh bottom
customer_reviews.text: My cat was afraid of it. I don’t think he liked the mesh bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy the space and it's roomy enough for multiple cats ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I volunteer at a cat rescue, and we put the cats in here when we clean their enclosures and do adoption shows. They enjoy the space and it's roomy enough for multiple cats and various-sized toys, beds and other structures. Quite durable, even when the cats climb it. They really enjoy frolicking in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your Cats Will Love You.
customer_reviews.text: Got this at Christmas for my cats. I have now trained them to run outside and enter the tent without taking off after a bird on their way out. They love this tent. Sometimes I can't get them out. This tent is sturdy. Easy to take down and set up. I don't leave it outside so there are daily openings and take downs. I haven't had any outside creatures bother my cats when they are on the enclosure. But the crows like to keep an eye on them.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it!! My black cat used to go out on a harness and the grey one was too scared to even go out, but they both loooove this tent! The best part is I don't have to be out there with them all the time in case they wiggle out of the harness. I just check on them every once in a while but they're always just chilling enjoying the day and watching the birds. Best purchase I ever made for them. Super easy to pop up and down and store in the deck box.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great for securing cats or other pets
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you want to keep your cats in a secure area, I used this when I went camping with my furbabies and it's very roomy (had their beds, food, water & litter box in the tent). I've also used this when we were moving as I didn't want them to run out of my house.
customer_reviews.author: sarah Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Setup was incredibly easy - unfolded the tent poles, pulled the top strings. Voila! Cat loves it. Well, loves/hates it. Because the thing is doing it’s job. She gets to watch all the chipmunks and bunnies and birds around her but she’s not able to take off. The netting is strong enough to withstand the “YOU TRICKED ME!” realization of the cat so once the cat settles in - we can be at peace.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great product happy cat!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Tyvek instructions sewn to the inside of the carrying bag. Great quality. One very happy cat. Mesh floor allowed him to nibble grass. Enough space to stalk a stray insect. Both owner and furkid relaxed and at ease. I field tested the canopy in my backyard. Kirby begged to go back outside after we chilled for about an hour. Recommend to cat owners with cats that enjoy the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lara A. Sciaraffa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened this one yet but based on my many years of experience with my old one it really is great! My cats love it and I can even crawl in with them. I do use it primarily indoors.
customer_reviews.author: KMF

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this. My neighbors bought it after seeing my cats in it. There is enough room for my large tom cat and my siamese to both comfortably explore, or snuggle, what ever they choose to do. It's so easy to assemble and de-assemble. I bought one for my sister-in-law to use with her ferret, she loves it too! Can't recommend it enough. My husband is too worried about what the neighbors/people driving by will think because it's not every day you see a cat tent, but I don't care. My cats love being outside, and this way I don't have to worry about them escaping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to do a 3100 mile rv trip with two cats. They were happy, I was happy. Sets up and tears down in seconds and seems like it will last for years. Only recommendations to the manufacturer is to make the door a little bigger to be able to grab the stuff the kitty's push to the back. Not a huge deal but would be better. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: OMG So easy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a different habitat first, and were very disappointed. The other one was basically a human tent, with opaque sides that had to be rolled up on all 4 sides to expose the mesh, and tent poles that had to be snapped together and threaded through the tent. Poorly functional. Then we did better shopping and found this. OMG so easy to assemble - snaps together in 1 second. Disassembles just a fast. Pure mesh, no opaque sides. What could be more perfect. Affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this tent! I will not let them roam on their own outside and this tent did just the right trick for them. It also sets up super easily! I was a bit confused and saddened when I saw we did not get the tunnel part for some odd reason but they still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great way to give a housecat some outside time
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. It’s so big I could fit in it myself! It’s a great way to give a housecat some outside time. My only concern is my cat tends to like to stretch and her claws catch on the netting. I can easily see her tearing through the netting so if you have a clawing cat, its worth keeping an eye on your fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: lucybusmc

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bought it for my cat who needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for my cat who needed to be restricted from jumping for a few months because of a leg injury. It's well constructed and provides great visibility and air circulation. Plenty of room for her bedding, food/water bowls, littler box and toys. I'm 5'10" and can easily fit through the opening, although I wish they'd move to a bottom flap-type opening because the round hole does it make it challenging to remove/clean the litter box, bowls, etc. My cat likes it so much she lays in it even when the opening isn't closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit my cat LOVES this tent!! He even goes in it and sits when I put it in the garage and close the garage door! Go figure! I never leave my cat unattended in it. I am always nearby just in case another animal comes around. I close it up at the end of the day and put it in my garage. It is very light and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stine

customer_reviews.title: Great cat tent!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I thought! Plenty of room for cat, toys, blanket, and small litter box. Great for the patio outside on nice days so the cat can be out! As others say, I would never leave the cat alone in the tent, but great for when we're outside working in the yard or watching from the house. So far our cat is not jumping up and clawing the mesh....!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough you could sleep in it outside under the stars!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for when one of my cats had her kittens. It worked out differently than planned so they ended up not using it. I gave it to a friend who runs a non profit cat business and she uses it for various times and reasons. But these products ABO has are great!!! So much to choose from too. Hard not to buy a bunch more stuff. My cats are VERY spoiled!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Good buy so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far love it and so do the cats. I can't really speak on durability, haven't used it but once. It's far easier to put up, take down, and store then the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great For Introducing Cats Indoors
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a new 3 month old kitten for my apartment with an existing adult cat who is quite picky about being around new people and animals. To avoid needless territorial conflict, I got this to keep he cats isolated until they could get used to each other, by being a temporary home for the kitten. This is really quite spacious and had room for a cat bed, litter box, food tray and bowls, a cardboard box for hiding/fun, and a few toys and play space. It only took the cats about 4 days to get used to each other, probably thanks to this product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, works well
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loves this. He remains really calm and observes birds and bugs. Momma can even fit inside with him periodically. Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: d3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up! Just pull the string on top and it pops open similar to an Umbrella! The cats love it! Now I can take them out on the deck without having to worry they will run off.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your lawn
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and take down. Compacts and fits anywhere. Used this to introduce the new kitten to our cat. Made them get used to eachother while still having a barrier between them. Took it outside on warm summer days and brought the cat with me. Cat was very happy being outside. Put a towel or blanket on top to give some shade (really helps keep kitty cool) and it literally became a wonderful little pic-nic spot. I do suggest supervising, as they could scratch/claw through the mesh if they were determined. If you've ever wanted to let kitty outside but not be able to run away, this is a great way to do that!
customer_reviews.author: TastyWhale

customer_reviews.title: not for bobcats
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes being outside so much that he stands at the back door and whines like a dog. I don't like to let him out as he's only an indoor cat. So this is my happy medium for him. And he hates it. This is a tease to him. He whines when he is in this because he wants to roam free. I think my domestic thinks he is a bobcat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huwer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Please do not entrust your pet’s safety outdoors to this product. We tried this indoors to keep 2 busy little kittens subdued to recover from spay and neuter. They were able to jump up and collapse the tent and the tunnel fasteners are not nearly secure. I would never ever ever use this outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this thing! It's really easy to take down and put up. I haven't been able to get it back in it's storage bag, which is my only negative thing to say about, but it's not really an issue. I've had it for a couple weeks now and it seems to be pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up/disassemble and our cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: We set this kitty tent it up on the deck when we're outside so our cat can be part of the fun. He loves it. The people who have posted that their cats have ripped through tent must have cats with some serious teeth/claws. Our guy climbs to the top using his claws and the tent doesn't have the slightest bit of damage. We put some of his toys in with him, too. So that might keep him from clawing and chewing the enclosure more than others. The Happy Habitat is really easy to set up and disassemble, just be sure to read the directions. Only downside is that the storage bag could be a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: A good sized cat tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent great for our cats, it sets up in seconds. I really like that the material is incredibly strong. Our cats relentlessly tried to claw a hole and eventually gave up. Its surprisingly sturdy once set up and has high quality zippers. The only issue i had was the zipper lock it did not stay in place given enough time our cats would probably escape.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Suleta

customer_reviews.title: Must have for rv families traveling with cats.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing outdoor play area for your cats. We rv and had originally bought an octagon shaped product that broke on first use and we could not fit both of our cats in. This product is great. Lots if space for two 20 plus pound cats to relax outside. Bottom protects from escape. Cats claws do not get snagged. Sets up in 5 seconds and tears down just as quickly. Small carrying case. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Three Boyz Gone Rving

customer_reviews.title: This tent has been wonderful for a kitten recovering from a leg injury
customer_reviews.text: This tent has been wonderful for a kitten recovering from a leg injury. It's big enough for a litter box, food and water bowls, bedding, and some toys. It allows my kitten to watch his siblings go about their day and stay entertained. Sometimes they join him. :) I also purchased the ABO tunnel attachment. Although the kittens like the added room it offers, the tunnel is difficult to attach b/c the zippers are poorly constructed. (See my product review comment.)
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves This
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use on the deck for our indoor cat. I was worried that he'd try to get out and scratch it to pieces but I was pleasantly surprised that he does neither! At first, I put a rug in the bottom because I thought the screening would bother his feet but the rug got rained on and a soggy mess so I took it out. Have since been using it without the rug and the cat is just fine with the screened floor. He begs to go out into his little bit of paradise and he loves to sit and watch the bugs and bees fly around. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: gailpj

customer_reviews.title: Now they really enjoy sniffing the air and lounging next to us when ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitties used to watch from the doorway whenever we were hanging out on the balcony. It took them a little while to get used to their new tent, but after we put it up inside with their toys and catnip in it for a day or so, they adjusted. Now they really enjoy sniffing the air and lounging next to us when it's nice out. It's pretty easy to put up and collapse. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. It would be nice if there can be some cover to provide some shelter so my cat and feel more secured. But it is a good tent. I just put over a towel to create a nice hide out look for my kitty. This is my second one. Good quality. Reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Cool, like it but the
customer_reviews.text: Entrance is too small, need it to be larger so I can pull the cat litter box back / forth with ease. Watch they will create one and charge extra - maybe I will get a percentage for the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

product_meta.title: Outback Jack Outdoor Cat Enclosures For Indoor Cats [Portable Cat Tent, Cat Tunnel, and Playhouse] (Play Tents for Cats and Small Animals)
product_meta.description: Style:Happy Habitat Cat TentEvery cat deserves a day in the sun and our Kitty Compound Happy Habitat and Fun Run offer the perfect solution They provide a safe environment for your indoor cat to enjoy time outside with over 30 square feet of activity space a 360-degree view and an attachable tunnel that offers new ways for your pet to explore They can be used together or separately and are perfect for everyday use on your deck lawn balcony and more! Cats have a strong desire to go outside and often the risks are too high for them to roam free Our secure cat enclosures give your cat access to outdoor sights sound and smells in a safe place They are the perfect size for your cat to play pounce or curl up for a nap Our unique design makes it easy to connect the Fun Run and Happy Habitat to create the Kitty Compound Set up is easy and no tools are required For travel and storage they fold tightly into convenient carry bags which are included
feature_bullets: ALLOWS INDOOR PETS TO SAFELY ENJOY A DAY IN THE SUN – Perfect for everyday use on your deck, lawn, balcony, and more. Allows cats and other small pets to safely enjoy a day in the sun with a 360-degree view while keeping unwanted predators out. We recommend testing the play tent indoors prior to outdoor use.

PERFECT PLAY TENT FOR CATS AND SMALL ANIMALS – With over 30 square feet of activity space, this outdoor playhouse is large enough for multiple cats, rabbits, guinea pigs, ferrets, and other small animals. To maximize playtime, there is plenty of extra space for toys, treats, litter box, and even a bed.

IDEAL FOR BOTH OUTDOOR AND INDOOR USE: Breathable, mesh fabric keeps your indoor cat or small pet closer to nature and protects them from annoying bugs and predators making this the perfect outdoor cat house or pet tent. Mesh sides and bottom allow for easy clean-up. Indoors the tent is ideal for kittens, isolating an injured pet, or introducing a new pet.
QUICK & EASY SET UP: Made of durable, high quality mesh with a pop-up feature for quick and easy set up. Includes 2 tent pegs for staking down your outdoor cat enclosures.

LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE DESIGN FOR TRAVEL WITH EASY SETUP - Portable, lightweight design makes transporting your outdoor cat tent simple. Compact design easily folds into a convenient carry bag for travel, storage, and convenience. Setup of this portable cat tent-cat house is a breeze with our easy pull string design. Perfect for camping, a picnic, or a day at the beach.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
